name: StuffIt Archive Index File
summary: Learn about .SIDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: SIDX files do not store the files they reference. They only store information about the file contents in a separate archive.

description: Index file created by StuffIt Deluxe, a file compression and decompression utility; contains a list of reference information about files in a separate file archive; enables users to browse the contents of a particular archive without having to process or decompress it first.
